**Eco-Friendly Ceiling Fan**: Design a ceiling fan with eco-friendly materials and energy-saving features. This could include using recycled or sustainable materials for the fan blades and housing, as well as incorporating energy-efficient motors and LED lighting.

**Ceiling Fan with Air Purification**: Incorporate an air purification system into the ceiling fan to help improve indoor air quality. This could include using activated carbon filters, UV-C light sanitization, or even HEPA filtration to remove pollutants and allergens from the air.

**Ceiling Fan with Built-In Speakers**: Integrate high-quality speakers into the ceiling fan to provide a surround sound audio experience. This could include Bluetooth connectivity, voice control, or even integration with streaming services for hands-free listening.

**Ceiling Fan with Integrated Lighting**: Combine the ceiling fan with adjustable, energy-efficient LED lighting. This could include a dimmer switch, color temperature control, or even integration with smart lighting systems.
**Ceiling Fan with Integrated Charging Stations**: Incorporate USB charging ports or wireless charging pads into the ceiling fan for convenient charging of smartphones, tablets, and other devices.
